channel.title: Pride, no prejudice on Blist Multilingual Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Pride, no prejudice on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: San Francisco City Hall lit up in rainbow lights for Pride, California (© Josh Edelson/AFP via Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Josh Edelson/AFP via Getty Images June is Pride Month, commemorating the Stonewall uprising, a series of protests by the LGBTQIA+ community that took place on June 28, 1969, in response to a police raid at the Stonewall Inn in Greenwich Village in New York City. Various events around the world are held in June to honour and celebrate the LGBTQIA+ community, their history, achievements and ongoing pursuit for equality.
